detail_desc: Top in soft jersey with short butterfly sleeves. The cotton content of the top is organic.
Slightly longer hooded top in soft fleece with appliqués and embroidery. Long raglan sleeves, a kangaroo pocket and ribbing at the cuffs and hem.
Long-sleeved top in patterned, lightweight sweatshirt fabric with a wrapover lined hood and ribbing at the cuffs and hem.
Jersey vest top with a diagonal drawstring at the front, racer back and raw-edge neckline and armholes.
T-shirt in soft, patterned cotton jersey. Concealed press-stud on one shoulder (except in sizes 1½-4Y), and a rounded hem with short slits in the sides. Slightly longer at the back.
Short, straight-cut dress in jersey with a contrasting colour trim around the neckline and sleeves. Unlined.

Sports bra in fast-drying functional fabric with jacquard-patterned details and lightly padded cups with removable inserts. Wide, adjustable shoulder straps that cross at the back and a wide hem. Light support. Seamless.
High-waisted jeans in washed superstretch denim with a zip fly and button, fake front pockets, real back pockets and super-skinny legs.
Imitation suede boots with a fold-down shaft and an opening at the back with a hook and loop fastening. Faux fur linings and insoles and fluted soles.
Boxer briefs with an elasticated waist and lined gusset.
Short, padded parka with a lined hood and zip and wind flap with press-studs down the front.  Side pockets with concealed press-studs, and ribbed cuffs. Lined.
Nightslip in soft viscose jersey with narrow, adjustable shoulder straps, triangular lace cups and covered elastication and a lace trim under the bust.
Fabric-covered Alice band decorated with plastic beads and a knot on top.
Long-sleeved shirt in soft cotton flannel with a collar, buttons down the front, a chest pocket with a button, and a gently rounded hem.
Shorts in soft sweatshirt fabric with an elasticated waist, kangaroo pocket and sewn-in turn-ups at the hems.
Jacquard-knit socks in a soft cotton blend.
Fitted vest top in stretch cotton jersey.
Hipster briefs in cotton jersey with lace details, a low waist, lined gusset and cutaway coverage at the back.
Off-the-shoulder top in ribbed jersey with a slight sheen. Opening with decorative crossover straps at the back, and long sleeves.
Flared skirt woven in an airy viscose blend with visible buttons at the top, a small frill trim and covered elastication at the waist, and large front pockets. Unlined.
Sports trousers in fast-drying, functional fabric with an elasticated drawstring waist, zipped side pockets and tapered legs with elasticated hems.
Blouse in an airy viscose weave with a round neckline, small opening with a concealed button at the back of the neck and 3/4-length balloon sleeves with wide, buttoned cuffs.

Set with two pairs each of earrings, hair clips and hair grips in metal decorated with sparkly stones and plastic beads. Length of earrings approx. 5 cm, length of hair clips 7 cm, length of hair grips approx. 6 cm.
Trainers in imitation leather with a padded edge and tongue, and lacing at the front. Mesh linings and insoles and patterned soles.

Soft, non-wired bra in velvet and lace with unlined cups that give the bust a natural shape and provide light support. Narrow adjustable shoulder straps, wide elastic trim at the hem and a narrow fastening at the back with two pairs of hooks and eyes.
Sarong in a softly draping weave with ties at the top and a small hole to thread the tie through after winding it around the waist. Flounced trims.
Long-sleeved top in soft fleece with a lined, drawstring hood, zipped side pockets, and ribbing at the cuffs and hem.
Trainers with lacing at the front and a lightly padded edge and tongue. Mesh linings and fabric insoles.

Calf-length dress in cotton crêpe with narrow adjustable shoulder straps and a scalloped trim at the top. Buttons down the front, smocking at the back and a seam at the waist with a flared skirt. Unlined.
Jersey-lined trousers in narrow-wale cotton corduroy. Elasticated waist with a twisted drawstring and one back pocket.
Fitted top in a fine-knit viscose blend with a round neckline and long sleeves.

Fully lined swimsuit with a V-neck and flounces at the top. Lined cups with removable inserts that shape the bust and provide good support, adjustable shoulder straps and gathers in the sides for best fit over the tummy. The polyamide and polyester content of the swimsuit are recycled.
Fine-knit trainer socks in a soft cotton blend with elasticated tops.
Short, sleeveless, straight-cut dress in softly draping satin with a small pleated stand-up collar that ties at the back of the neck, and a small opening at the back. Lined.
Wide jumper in a soft, fine knit containing some wool with dropped shoulders, long sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Sleeveless playsuit in viscose jersey with narrow shoulder straps, a V-neck at the front, and a V-neck at the back with a horizontal strap. Elasticated drawstring waist, side pockets and short legs.
Long shirt in an airy viscose weave with a collar, buttons down the front and chest pocket. Long sleeves with buttoned cuffs and a rounded hem with slits in the sides. Slightly longer at the back.
Jumper in a soft, jacquard-knit cotton blend with buttons at the back of the neck and long raglan sleeves.
Plastic water bottle with a screw top and practical wrist strap that also holds the top in place. Capacity 550 ml.
Rubber hair elastics without metal clips.

Set with a long-sleeved dress and pair of tights in a cotton blend. Dress in jersey with a frill over the shoulders, a small opening and button at the back of the neck and a gathered seam at the waist for added width and soft draping. Tights in a textured weave with an elasticated waist. The cotton content of the set is organic.

Short, pile-lined parka in a cotton weave with padded sleeves, a stand-up collar and pile-lined hood with a detachable faux-fur trim. Zip and wind flap with concealed press-studs down the front, and a drawstring at the waist and hem. Flap front pockets with a press-stud and a concealed pocket behind with a press-stud at the top. Elasticated tab with a concealed press-stud at the cuffs, and a small back vent. Lined.

Trousers in sturdy cotton twill with a zip fly and button, side pockets, welt back pockets with a button and flap leg pockets with a button. Slim Fit – a fit that is close-fitting at the thighs, knees and ankles to create a fitted silhouette.
Long-sleeved blouse in woven fabric with a collar, V-neck, buttons down the front, buttoned cuffs and a rounded hem.
Kaftan in soft, airy jersey with a V-neck, short sleeves and detachable tie belt at the waist.

Calf-length, V-neck dress with a sewn-in wrapover at the front to create a draped effect. Short, wide, softly draping sleeves, a seam at the waist and a skirt with a sewn-in wrapover at the front. Visible seam that runs down the full length of the back. Unlined.
5-pocket jeans in washed stretch denim with a regular waist, button fly and skinny legs with quilted sections on the knees.
V-neck top in soft cotton jersey with scalloping at the top and narrow shoulder straps.
Wide hairband in cotton jersey with a twisted detail.
Earrings with a hammered metal disc and a shell pendant. Length 4 cm.
Top in soft modal jersey with narrow adjustable shoulder straps, triangular lace cups with removable inserts, and lace under the bust and at the back.
Fine-knit socks in a soft cotton blend with a ribbed shaft.
Pyjamas in soft cotton jersey with a print motif. Short-sleeved top. Shorts with an elasticated waist.
Calf-length dress in a patterned modal and cotton weave with a V-neck and short sleeves. Gathered seam under the bust and at the back, and an asymmetric skirt. Lined.
Boxy cardigan knitted in a soft wool blend with a V-neck, large buttons down the front, long raglan sleeves and wide ribbing at the cuffs and hem.
Fine-knit tights in a soft cotton blend with an elasticated waist.

Blouse in ain airy weave with a rounded, frill-trimmed collar, buttons down the front and flounces at the top of the button band. Yoke with a pleat at the back and 3/4-length puff sleeves with narrow, covered elastication at the cuffs.
Mesh trainers with imitation leather details, a lightly padded edge and tongue, elasticated lacing at the front and a loop at the back. Fabric linings and insoles.
Ankle-length boiler suit in an airy cotton weave with a resort collar, chest pockets and an elasticated waist. Buttons down the front and half-length sleeves with sewn-in turn ups.

V-neck jumpsuit in airy chiffon containing glittery threads with concealed hook-and-eye fasteners, pleats at the shoulders and long sleeves with decorative flounces. Side pockets, an elasticated seam at the waist with decorative ties and wide legs. Partly lined in jersey.
Sleeveless blouse in an airy patterned weave with a V-neck opening at the front, ties at the top and a pleated trim around the neckline and sleeves. Lined.
Yoga top in ribbed, softly draping jersey made from a silk blend. Shoulder straps with a wrapover and open section at the back.
Trousers in a soft rib knit with a lightly brushed finish. High waist with covered elastication and a drawstring, and straight, wide legs.
Short-sleeved shirt in a patterned viscose and cotton weave with a turn-down collar, French front and rounded hem. Slim Fit – a fit with narrow shoulders and a tapered waist for a fitted silhouette.
Long cardigan in a soft knit containing some wool with front pockets and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. No buttons. Detachable belt in braided imitation suede.
Short-sleeved sports top in fast-drying, breathable functional fabric with a ventilating mesh back. Regular Fit.
Fitted one-shoulder top in ribbed jersey with one shoulder strap.
Calf-length, sleeveless dress in soft linen jersey with a V-neck front and back and slits in the sides.
Baby Exclusive. Romper suit in soft, organic cotton jersey with a button placket and chest pocket. Short sleeves and short legs, both with sewn-in turn-ups, and concealed press-studs at the crotch.
V-neck satin blouse with gathers at the shoulders, short flounced sleeves and a rounded hem. Slightly longer at the back.
High-waisted leggings in glossy jersey with covered elastication at the waist.
Fully lined bikini top with removable inserts that shape the bust and provide good support. Narrow, adjustable shoulder straps and covered elastication at the hem. No fasteners.
Top in printed sweatshirt fabric with ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.
Short wrap dress in soft jersey made from a cotton and viscose blend with a V-neck and ties at one side. Short sleeves with sewn-in turn-ups and an asymmetric hem. Unlined.
Push-up bra in lace with underwired, padded cups for a larger bust and fuller cleavage. Adjustable shoulder straps and a hook-and-eye fastening at the back.
Short lace dress with short lace sleeves, a seam at the waist and flared skirt. Partly lined in jersey.
Knee-length, A-line skirt in jersey crêpe with a high waist with covered elastication. Unlined.
Tube scarf in a soft, textured knit.

Super push-up bra in lace and mesh with underwired, thickly padded cups to maximise the bust and create a fuller cleavage. Narrow, adjustable shoulder straps, a wide lace trim at the hem and a hook-and-eye fastening at the back.

Sleeveless dress in a patterned crêpe weave with an opening and button at the back of the neck and elastication and a flounce around the neckline. Elasticated seam with a decorative bow at the waist. Unlined.
